Recent Projects

Barambe

| 2017 | http://barambe.com

Bar browser/mobile application for real time order-creation and management

  • Connected user generated orders to render real time in bartender's queue
  • Implemented drinks full-stack design from UI/UX up to database schemas
  • Designed experience of bar ordering flow by opening/closing drink tabs
  • Persisted web/native application state so user's changes present accurately on reload

TrainRecc

| 2017 | http://trainrecc.herokuapp.com

Playlist-building platform encouraging users to recommend music to one another

  • Created MySql schemas for relationships between users, playlist, and songs
  • Utilized web requests to web-scrape http://www.hypem.com to implement songs into website
  • Solved complication of integrating user-searched mp3 files into application
  • Maintained code consistency & uncomplicated git workflow for team to follow

PickAFlix

| 2017 | http://pickaflix.herokuapp.com

Movie recommendation application inviting users to explore new films

  • Improved legacy application with private live screening and chat room features using WebSockets
  • Configured YouTube live stream to integrate within chat room

Chick-fil-A Saturday

| 2016 | http://chick-fil-a-saturday.herokuapp.com

Order Menu for colleagues to select Chick-fil-A entrees

  • Developed easy to use UX for users to order food from menu
  • Constructed authenication component which persisted user data in MongoDB
  • Integrated user deadline running timer with MomentJS
